summary: Examines the diversity of human sexual and gender variance around the globe, with commentary by scientific experts and first-hand accounts of people who do not conform to a simple male/female binary.
cast: Gore Vidal|Calpernia Addams|Beth Aynsley|Max Beck|Tamara Beck|Milton Diamond|Alice Dreger|Anne Fausto-Sterling|Louis Gooren|Sylvia Guerrero|Andrea James|Shivananda Khan|Luke|Michelle|Mike|Noah|James Pfaus|Richard|Joan Roughgarden|Richard Sipe|Gloria Wekker|Sam Winter|Lester Wright
title: Middle Sexes: Redefining He and She
